title: Office of Surgeon General Sunset Act
content: Office of Surgeon General Sunset Act - Terminates the Office and position of the Surgeon General of the Public Health Service, transferring the Office's functions to the Assistant Secretary for Health of the Department of Health and Human Services. Requires that the Office of Management and Budget make determinations of the functions transferred. Provides for related delegation, reorganization, rules and regulations, transfer and allocations of appropriations and personnel, other transfers, the effect on personnel, and the effect on legal documents, proceedings, and administrative actions.
